content: hey RPG years I wanted to show you something come a little closer come a
little closer yeah it's a blast from the RPG past I found this little baby in
some old RPG things I had it is the dragon bone let's go to the table I'll
show you how it works so here we go guys here's my dragon bone you can see it's
not too big to access the battery you have to undo the screws on the back and
it just has a button on the front that you push and a dial selector for the
type of die so it goes d 3 d 4 D 6 D 8 D 10 D 12 D 20 and percentile 100% so
there you go and I really kind of like this thing it's really handy to have
actually as a DM and I find that I like it better than the virtual rulers
actually you know your phone turns off and you got to turn it back on or you
know it to conserve power this thing doesn't run like your phone does you
know you have to keep turning it back on that kind of thing you just hit the but
you just select dala selector and hit the button you're ready to go so even
though it's you know old technology it's still pretty cool I I like to use it so
there it is that's the dragon bone I hope you enjoyed watching me play with
my dragon bone I'll see you next time RPG years
